title: What are some examples of chemical elements and their uses? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am going to just include use in elemental form, here is a sampling. You could probably find a use for almost every element. Some are often made as intermediates in chemical processing or research, such as bromine. Here are some common ones I can do from memory without googling :-) Hydrogen = non polluting fuelHelium = balloon gasCarbon = drawing pigmentNitrogen = refrigerantOxygen = resuscitationNeon = signsSodium = coolantMagnesium = flaresAluminium = windowsSilicon = chipsPhosphorous = incendiariesSulphur = gunpowderChlorine = biocideArgon = weldingTitanium = surgical platesChromium = platingIron = knivesNickel = coinsCopper = pipesZinc = batteriesTin = cansIodine = disinfectantLead = bulletsTungsten = light bulbsMercury = thermometersOsmium = nibsPalladium = catalystPlatinum = jewellerySilver = cutleryGold = teethUranium = weights
